abstract: The diffable data source’s handlers for reordering items.
overview:
## Discussion

Provide reordering handlers to support the reordering of items in your collection view.

The system calls the [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UICollectionViewDiffableDataSource-9tqpa/ReorderingHandlers-swift.struct/didReorder] handler after a reordering transaction ([doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/NSDiffableDataSourceTransaction-swift.struct]) occurs, so you can update your data backing store with information about the changes.

items.description: A transaction that describes the changes after reordering the items in the view.
items.name: NSDiffableDataSourceTransaction

items.description: A transaction that describes the changes after reordering the items in a section.
items.name: NSDiffableDataSourceSectionTransaction
